entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assemblies returned from AppDomain.AssemblyResolve are checked for matching strong name #101029
  • JIT: CSE removes throwing modulo computation on x86 #101028
    9.0.0
  • arm64: ror+eor -> eor, ror #101027
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Trivial use of Delegate.Method is not enabling delegate targets for reflection #101026
    9.0.0
  • I think that `Partition.Trim(...)` from `ArraySharedPool<T>` may be doing some unnecessary work #101025
  • [API Proposal]: WrappedValueAttribute describing a type that wraps another value #101023
  • .NET 6 Linux ClientWebSocket memory leak #101022
  • Use another Core Assembly with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #101018

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: MethodInfo.Invoke overload with span<object?> instead of object?[] #101032

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't ignore the case when dataflow doesn't know what's going on #101031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for containing RotateLeft/RotateRight on Arm64 #101030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Activator.CreateInstance for shared generic structs #101021
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.122, windows: 123.0.6312.122 #101017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Bump NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.4 #101033
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update .gitattributes #100736
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • dotnet watch fails when directory has multiple csproj files #33674

PullRequests

Created

  • Identify loongarch64 as valid arch #40169
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Updated

  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Type aliases / abbreviations / newtype #410

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Enable navigation to decompiled sources not working #68883
    17.8 P4
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync fails with the new slnx files #73004
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer #68469
    17.8 P4
  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused cancellation tokens from api #73020
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass along generic args to allow for non-allocating lambda lookup paths #73019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make enum a single byte #73018
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a callback style in the asset finding code #73017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change all messages to pass back their checksum. Switch to callback style #73015
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where the streaming service might return a different object than what is in the asset cache #73014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Moving to a streaming model for piping assets from the host to the server. #73013
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'Make anonymous function static' feature #73012
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
    Area-Compilers
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to collection exprs #73009
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • addCascadingValue consumed from a library extension method acts as a singleton in Blazor Web App #55125
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55124
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55123
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #55122
  • NET8 ResourceManagerStringLocalizerFactory not Work In ALC #55121
  • Enhanced Load doesn't reprocess JS on Same Page #55119

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55120
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #55116

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade fails, conflicting messages on installed vs needed #21825
  • Allow fullscreen by MAUI.Blazor calls #21824
  • ScrollView does not work inside VerticalStackLayout #21822
  • Build Error due to Mismatch Between `TargetFrameworkVersion` and `targetSdkVersion` #21820

Closed

  • `Image` displays JPG photos taken in Portrait orientation in Landscape orientation (regression in 8.0.10) #21314
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    community ✨
  • Hide button for screenshot on test 19509 #21823

Merged

  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image

Updated

  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [Housekeeping] Fix weak UITest #21796
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Small fix to IInjectableService and lazy loading that removes constants of ParameterBindingInfo objects #33534
